<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>43565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_492</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_492</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Rectas notables de un triángulo. Actividades</string>
            <string language="en">Lines associated with a triangle. Activities.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnet verbundenes mit einem Dreieck. 
Aktivitäten.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Raye associé à une triangle. Activités.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alinha associado com um triângulo. 
Atividades.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allinea collegato con un triangolo. 
Attività.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές που συνδέονται με ένα τρίγωνο. 
Δραστηριότητες.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el estudio de las rectas y puntos notables de un triángulo. Se estudian los conceptos anteriores y se proponen ejercicios de tipo test para afianzar los conocimientos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the lines and points associated with a triangle. The unit explains the aforementioned concepts and includes a test which allows the student to improve their grasp of the subject.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rectas notables</string>
            <string language="en">associated lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">puntos notables</string>
            <string language="en">associated points</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche Gebrauchsimulationen, 
zum der Zeilen und der Punkte zu studieren mit einem Dreieck verband. 
Die Maßeinheit erklärt die vorher erwähnten Konzepte und 
schließt einen Test ein, der dem Kursteilnehmer erlaubt, ihre 
Reichweite des Themas zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations d'utilisations 
pour étudier les lignes et les points a associées à une triangle. 
L'unité explique les concepts mentionnés ci-dessus et inclut 
un essai qui permet à l'étudiant d'améliorer leur prise du sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos para estudar 
as linhas e os pontos associou com um triângulo. A unidade 
explica os conceitos acima mencionados e inclui um teste que permita 
que o estudante melhore seu aperto do assunto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi per studiare 
le righe ed i punti ha associato con un triangolo. L'unità 
spiega i concetti sopraccennati ed include una prova che permette che 
l'allievo migliori la loro stretta dell'oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να μελετήσει τις γραμμές και τα σημεία σύνδεσε 
με ένα τρίγωνο. Η μονάδα εξηγεί τις προαναφερθείσες 
έννοιες και περιλαμβάνει μια δοκιμή που επιτρέπει στο σπουδαστή 
για να βελτιώσει τον έλεγχό τους του θέματος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verbundene Zeilen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verbundene Punkte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lignes associées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">points associés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">plano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linhas associadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pontos associados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punti collegati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχετικά σημεία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
